tha-ap166:0.3_0: He gave a teaching in many ways.
tha-ap166:1.2_0: world’s Elder, unskilled in the world,
tha-ap166:2.1_0: The teacher, standing with such a teacher
tha-ap166:3.2_0: when I saw a great sage,
tha-ap166:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any bad places
tha-ap166:5.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap166:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kūṭadanta.
tha-ap166:7.1_0: on the fourth part of the senior monks, who grows old.
